column4: Hi, Just burnned a live CD 5.04 and tried to boot. It goes until menu that ask language. Then keyboard stop working. I tried many boot options but same result. Went through Forums but found nothing. Can any body help.
I have a Medion laptop AMD64. any idea?
Try burning the CD as slow as possible. My FC4 disks all failed checksum and wouldn't install glibc (which is kinda important) when I burned them at 24x.
